education.title: education
education.description: My educational journey began with a strong foundation through elementary to high school, and continued with a degree in Informatics Engineering from Universitas Terbuka. This flexible and technology-driven learning environment sharpened my skills in programming, system analysis, and digital problem-solvingâ€”forming the core of my work in web development, SEO, and digital strategy.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description:

For me, games are more than entertainmentâ€”they're an extension of how I learn, explore, and improve focus, all while having fun with my family or during downtime.
